title: Gold player looking for ranked 5s team
body:
Looking for a semi serious ranked 5's team 

I main Mid but can go virtually any role with no worries but I do prefer top and mid.
To show you my versatility in my champion pool these are the main champions I go in the respective roles I prefer.

Top : {{champion:39}} {{champion:5}} {{champion:24}} 
Mid: {{champion:127}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:103}} 

There are a lot more champions I can play but I normally prefer champions that have a high turning potential and do great burst late game.

I'm Gold V as of typing this with 11 rune pages ( 9 out of the 11 actually being filled) and a good grasp on masteries and item builds.

I'm a fairly laid back with most voice com services, that can also take jokes and criticism when it comes to my play style or just aspects of my personality. I don't care so much when it comes to touchy subjects. If you think I'm doing bad or have a way I could improve my play while in a match with me I won't mute you and will listen to what you have to say, after all I like playing to improve.

My IGN is Mystical 

I love you all and I hope you consider :D

replies.body:
Hey! You can join our team (Edged)
just send me a friend request and ill add you in!
We have a mixed playerbase (Plat, Silver, Bronze, Gold, anybody!) We currently have a Plat, Silver, Bronze, and another silver

Join ASAP!
